---
name: New Feature Tracker
about: Create a tracker for a new feature
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## General
- [ ] Add in new tests where applicable
- [ ] Implement feature
- [ ] Fix existing tests
- [ ] Self-Review
	- [ ] Clean-up pass
	- [ ] Main (is this implemented correctly) pass
	- [ ] Final (AI or peer-review) pass
- [ ] Format pull request
	- [ ] What was changed?
	- [ ] Why was it changed?
	- [ ] Why did I do it the way I did it?
	- [ ] What else should the reviewers know while reviewing?
- [ ] Create pull request

## Implementation
- [ ] ...
